verbose_text: For determining the role of p38 MAPK in hyperandrogenism induced ER stress, the GCs were pre-treated with the p38 MAPK inhibitor SB203580 (10 muM; Cell Signaling Technology, Boston, MA, USA) for 2 h and then incubated with 10 muM testosterone for another 24 h. Forskolin (FSK, 10 muM; Med Chem Express Company, Monmouth Junction, NJ, USA) and phorbol 12-myristate 13-acetate (PMA, 20 nM; Med Chem Express Company, Monmouth Junction, NJ, USA) were used to mimic LH stimulation.
